They're going after promiscuous titles, right? Personally I think they should just add the option to hide titles deemed "NSFW" and have it enabled by default.

I wouldn't so much mind them censoring stuff if it wasn't for the double standard; games like The Witcher 3 have sex scenes, but there's no way they're taking that down.

I wouldn't mind them censoring stuff if it wasn't for the double standard. The Witcher 3 has more explicit scenes than many of the games that are being called out, but there's no way they'll force them to change anything.

Personally I'd like to see an option to hide NSFW titles that's enabled by default.
